biolockj.util

Class DockerUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.util.DockerUtil

  • public class DockerUtil
extends Object
    DockerUtil for Docker integration.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static String BLJ_BASH
      Docker image name for simple bash scripts (awk,gzip,pear).
      protected static String COMPUTE_SCRIPT
      Docker environment variable holding the name of the compute script file: "COMPUTE_SCRIPT"
      static String CONTAINER_CONFIG_DIR
      All containers mount the host Config directory to the container"config" volume
      static String CONTAINER_INPUT_DIR
      All containers mount the host "input.dirPaths" to the container "input" volume
      static String CONTAINER_META_DIR
      Some containers mount the "metadata.filePath" to the container "meta" volume
      static String CONTAINER_OUTPUT_DIR
      All containers mount "project.pipelineDir" to the container "pipelines" volume
      static String CONTAINER_PRIMER_DIR
      Some containers mount the "trimPrimers.filePath" to the containers "primer" volume.
      protected static String DEFAULT_DOCKER_HUB_USER
      Name of the BioLockJ Docker account ID: "biolockj"
      protected static String DOCKER_HUB_USER
      Config name of the Docker Hub user with the BioLockJ containers: "docker.user"
      Docker Hub URL: https://hub.docker.com
      By default the "biolockj" user is used to pull the standard modules, but advanced users can deploy their own versions of these modules and add new modules in their own Docker Hub account.
      protected static String SAVE_CONTAINER_ON_EXIT
      Config property removed the default --rm flag on docker run command if set to TRUE: "docker.saveContainerOnExit"
      static String SPAWN_DOCKER_CONTAINER
      Name of the bash script function used to generate a new Docker container: "spawnDockerContainer"

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DockerUtil() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static List<String> buildSpawnDockerContainerFunction(BioModule module)
      Build the "spawnDockerContainer" method, which takes container name, in/out port, and optionally script path parameters.
      static String getDockerImage(BioModule module)
      Return the name of the Docker image needed for the given module.
      static String getDockerUser(String moduleName)
      Return the Docker Hub user ID.
      static File getDockerVolumeFile(String path, String containerPath, String label)
      Get mapped Docker system path from Config property by replacing the host system path with the mapped container path.
      static String getImageName(String className)
      Return the Docker Image name for the given class name.
      Return "blj_bash" for simple bash script modules that don't rely on special software
      Class names contain no spaces, words are separated via CamelCaseConvension.
      Docker image names cannot contain upper case letters, so this method substitutes "_" before the lower-case version of each capital letter.

      Example: JavaModule becomes java_module
      static String getImageVersion(String moduleName)
      Get the Docker image version if defined in the Config file
      If not found, return the default version "latest"
      static boolean isAwsManager()
      Boolean to determine if running Docker blj_manager
      static boolean isBljManager()
      Boolean to determine if running Docker blj_manager
      static boolean runAws()
      Return TRUE if running on AWS (based on Config props).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • DOCKER_HUB_USER

        protected static final String DOCKER_HUB_USER
        Config name of the Docker Hub user with the BioLockJ containers: "docker.user"
        Docker Hub URL: https://hub.docker.com
        By default the "biolockj" user is used to pull the standard modules, but advanced users can deploy their own versions of these modules and add new modules in their own Docker Hub account.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • buildSpawnDockerContainerFunction

        public static List<String> buildSpawnDockerContainerFunction(BioModule module)
                                                      throws Exception
        Build the "spawnDockerContainer" method, which takes container name, in/out port, and optionally script path parameters.
        Parameters:
        module - BioModule
        Returns:
        Bash function to run docker
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to build the function

      • getDockerImage

        public static String getDockerImage(BioModule module)
                             throws Exception
        Return the name of the Docker image needed for the given module.
        Parameters:
        module - BioModule
        Returns:
        Docker image name
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • getDockerUser

        public static String getDockerUser(String moduleName)
                            throws Exception
        Return the Docker Hub user ID. If none configured, return biolockj.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - Calling module
        Returns:
        Docker Hub User ID
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • getDockerVolumeFile

        public static File getDockerVolumeFile(String path,
                                       String containerPath,
                                       String label)
                                throws Exception
        Get mapped Docker system path from Config property by replacing the host system path with the mapped container path.
        Parameters:
        path - Config property
        containerPath - Local container path
        label - Path label
        Returns:
        Docker volume file object
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • getImageName

        public static String getImageName(String className)
                           throws Exception
        Return the Docker Image name for the given class name.
        Return "blj_bash" for simple bash script modules that don't rely on special software
        Class names contain no spaces, words are separated via CamelCaseConvension.
        Docker image names cannot contain upper case letters, so this method substitutes "_" before the lower-case version of each capital letter.

        Example: JavaModule becomes java_module
        Parameters:
        className - BioModule class name
        Returns:
        Docker Image Name
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • getImageVersion

        public static String getImageVersion(String moduleName)
                              throws Exception
        Get the Docker image version if defined in the Config file
        If not found, return the default version "latest"
        Parameters:
        moduleName - BioModule name
        Returns:
        Docker image version
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • isAwsManager

        public static boolean isAwsManager()
                            throws Exception
        Boolean to determine if running Docker blj_manager
        Returns:
        TRUE if running Docker blj_manager
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to determine Docker module type

      • isBljManager

        public static boolean isBljManager()
                            throws Exception
        Boolean to determine if running Docker blj_manager
        Returns:
        TRUE if running Docker blj_manager
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to determine Docker module type

      • runAws

        public static boolean runAws()
                      throws Exception
        Return TRUE if running on AWS (based on Config props).
        Returns:
        TRUE if project.env=aws
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur
